mapper.select: select o.rown, o.profile_no, o.user_no, o.height, o.weight, o.career, o.major, o.exp, o.profile_date, o.recently_exer, o.word, o.profile_gym_event, o.day, o.time, o.address from(select rownum as rown, p.profile_no, p.user_no, p.height, p.weight, p.career, p.major, p.exp, p.profile_date, p.recently_exer, p.word, p.profile_gym_event, p.day, p.time, p.address from(select profile_no, user_no, height, weight, career, major, exp, to_char(profile_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') as profile_date, recently_exer, word, profile_gym_event, day, time, address from profile where user_no = #{userNo} order by profile_date desc) p) o where rown = #{rownum}
